translations: 1. 漫游，闲逛：在一个地区或地方随意地、无目的地行走。
· He wanders around the city all day.
2. 走神，离题：在思考或讲话时偏离主题或集中注意力。
· Her mind wanders during the meeting.

sentences.sentence: The road wanders along through the hills.
sentences.translation: 这条路蜿蜒曲折地穿过山丘。

sentences.sentence: Any manager knows that his company will start falling apart if his attention wanders.
sentences.translation: 任何经理都知道如果他的注意力分散了他的公司将会开始分崩离析。

sentences.sentence: When he wanders along the road with his twisted stick we are all afraid to meet him alone.
sentences.translation: 当他拄着他那根弯曲的拐杖在路上闲逛时，我们都害怕单独遇到他。
